reviewText: Great collection of dvds from the GREAT man.
dvd were home made not good quality home mademade I though they were new for 43.dollar i paid for the
Amazing dvd collection from one of the greatest of all time
Great collection.  Style and skills, he had it all. Thanks for the memories Sugar.

taking me back to when I was young and handsome... and in the USMC and missed most of Sugar Ray Leonard.

Be careful with the audio; turn it all the way down and adjust.  Keep the remote in your hand.  It has nothing to do with the seller.  The DVDs are put together with class, but the old analog sound needs a higher volume than the preface menu page.

I will enjoy it until my last days as it reminds me of how many I had to give away, sacrifice myself!

this is one of the best collection that I have and would recommend this to anyone yes I said it yes I did and about to start over watching them again and and if anyone wants to watch them with me be my guest you are in for a hell of a fight
It's really cool to have his whole boxing collection
